synopsis.text: In a dystopian future ravaged by global warming, a young boy named Takara struggles to survive in the year 2100. The melting of polar ice caps and rising sea levels have wreaked havoc, and searing heatwaves have devastated animal and plant life across the planet. When a girl named Sara mysteriously travels through time from the present day, she joins forces with Takara on an adventure to navigate this harsh new world. Together they encounter flooded cities, food shortages, extreme weather events and other threats spawned by climate change. As the two children bond over their shared mission to stay alive, they discover that the key to humanity's future may lie in understanding and addressing mistakes of the past. Their journey becomes one of both outer and inner discovery, revealing the importance of courage and hope even in the face of existential global catastrophe. This family-oriented, action-packed film tackles pressing real-world issues while entertaining viewers young and old with messages about friendship, responsibility and safeguarding the Earth for future generations. Can Takara and Sara survive the environmental perils of the future and help turn the tide before itâ€™s too late? Their time-spanning quest holds lessons for audiences today about coming together to create positive change.
